      • bomberManInRangeHighAI

        private boolean bomberManInRangeHighAI(Enemy myEnemy)
        Checks whether or not enemy is in range of bomberman, which is within two cell movements.
        Parameters:
        myEnemy - the enemy that will have its position checked
        Returns:
        boolean on whether or not a high AI enemy is in range of bomberman.

      • aStar

        private int[] aStar(Enemy myEnemy)
        Path finding algorithm for the high AI enemy, using a* search. Does this by evaluating each frontier cell and picking the best candidate. Each frontier cell gets placed into ArrayList openSet, while searched cells are put into ArrayList closedSet. Cells with obstacles are put into ArrayList obstacles. Repeats these two steps until it finds the destination cell, which is bomberman.
        Parameters:
        myEnemy - high AI enemy
        Returns:
        int array of all the movements needed to reach bomberman.

      • returnRoute

        private int[] returnRoute(Cell cell)
        Method which returns the route of the path leading to bomberman. Does this by taking the last cell, where bomberman is located and repeatedly calling the parent cell until it reached the original enemy position. While calling the parent cell it notes which direction it need to travel from parent to child cell, storing it into a stack and finally transferring it into an integer array.
        Parameters:
        cell - the one which bomberman is located.
        Returns:
        integer array which contains the path for the enemy to reach bomberman

      • getMinCell

        private Cell getMinCell(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> openSet)
        Searches through all the cells in the open set of cells, and get the cell with the lowest search algorithm score possible.
        Parameters:
        openSet - the cells that haven't been searched through yet in the path finding algorithm
        Returns:
        the cell with the best score to reach bomberman.

      • getObstacle

        private boolean getObstacle(Cell cell,
                            Enemy myEnemy)
        Checks whether or not the cell in question has an obstacle in relation to if enemy has wall pass.
        Parameters:
        cell - current one being searched in path finding algorithm
        myEnemy - contains whether or not it has wall pass in determining if certain things are obstacles or not for the particular enemy
        Returns:
        boolean whether or not there is an obstacle in the cell

      • manhattan

        private int manhattan(int cellPosX,
                      int cellPosY)
        Takes future (x, y) positions of the enemy and returns the manhattan distance to bomberman.
        Parameters:
        cellPosX - a cell position X
        cellPosY - a cell position Y
        Returns:
        manhattan distance used in path finding algorithm.
